The infection of antigen-presenting cells with EV triggers a strong inflammatory response, and clinical outcome depends on the extent of the host's counterregulatory response. An increase in nitric oxide levels has been associated with poor outcome.
43 According to data from Uganda, HLA alleles B*67 and B*15 were associated with fatal outcomes, whereas B*07 and B*14 were associated with nonfatal outcomes, but this has not been confirmed in West Africa at present.
